title: No, Harvey Staub the ‘Pharmacist’ Is Not Right About COVID
subtitle: Tweets claiming to be authored by a pharmacist assert that a decline in Tamiflu sales proves COVID-19 is not as dangerous as claimed. It's a great case study in how not to use data.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: "False positives" for COVID that are actually cases of the flu or the common cold are inflating the real danger of COVID-19 and the pandemic.
